title: Issue with Clubs
body:
IGN: Skaarl Bot

I am having an issue with clubs, i was an owner of my own club prior to clubs being temporarily disabled and now i can no longer see either of the two clubs that i am in.

I do use the league friends app for andriod and can see both of the clubs i am in there and the chat logs for the clubs.

Clubs Names:

Cook and ¾ (I am the owner of this club)

Kled Mains OCE

NOTE* I am also not able to see the club tag in client or in game.

replies.body:
Hey there,

You'll have to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support for further assistance, this is/was a known issue after clubs went down quite some time ago.
